name: micheal andy
description:
Hi and thanks for taking the time to read this. I’m just a normal guy with a very good career doing what I love. I pay my bills,and have paid my dues as well. I enjoy doing things that are new and diffrent (at least for me) going places I’ve never been and even better places I’ve never heard of (that’s where you come in). I’ve spent my life trying to always do what I felt was the “right” thing. I don’t have any time or patience for games, liars, cheaters, etc. Now I’m looking for someone to share it with, You’ll have to trust me on this but I don’t do “one way relationships” you will be required to participate. Don’t be shy. If this sounds like something you might be interested in please let me know. ( I sold my crystal ball for down payment on the Harley) Good-luck
Micheal
